mapper.insert: insert into wedding (name, age, gender,phone,reservation,tiket) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{reservation}, #{tiket})
mapper.update: update wedding set name=#{name}, age=#{age},gender=#{gender}, phone=#{phone}, reservation=#{reservation}, tiket=#{tiket}, where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from wedding order by id desc
